content: They’ll work with them to find a way to get them to their appointment safely.Celebrating Patient Commitment with DCC ChampionsWe understand the importance of patients committing to their dialysis schedules. This is why we celebrate our incredible patients who consistently adhere to their dialysis schedules and consider them our DCC Champions. These patients take care of their health and inspire others by demonstrating the power of their commitment and resilience. DCC Champions will be honored at ceremonies within their respective clinics every quarter, receiving awards for their dedication to their health.Recognizing Exceptional Caregivers with DCC LifesaversAs a part of this campaign, we celebrate our amazing staff. The DCC Lifesavers program acknowledges exceptional DCC caregivers and staff who play a vital role in supporting and motivating patients during dialysis treatments. These dedicated professionals build strong, caring relationships with patients, ensuring treatment adherence and providing a positive and supportive environment. We will celebrate these fantastic Lifesavers each quarter through recognition ceremonies with awards, acknowledging their unwavering commitment to exceptional patient care.DCC’s Missed Treatment Campaign demonstrates our dedication to improving patient’s health.
title: DCC Missed Treatments Program - Dialysis Care Center
